memberdef.definition: using CGAL::Shape_detection::Point_set::Least_squares_circle_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, PointMap, NormalMap >::Item = Item_
memberdef.name: Item

memberdef.name: FT

memberdef.name: Region

memberdef.name: Primitive

memberdef.definition: using CGAL::Shape_detection::Point_set::Least_squares_circle_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, PointMap, NormalMap >::Region_unordered_map = std::unordered_map<Item, std::size_t, internal::hash_item<Item> >
memberdef.name: Region_unordered_map

parameterdescription.para: an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: the maximum distance from a point to a circle
the maximum angle in degrees between the normal of a point and the radius of a circle
the cos value computed as cos(maximum_angle * PI / 180), this parameter can be used instead of the maximum_angle
the minimum number of 2D points a region must have
the radius below which an estimated circle is considered as invalid and discarded
the radius above which an estimated circle is considered as invalid and discarded.
an instance of PointMap that maps an item to Kernel::Point_2
an instance of NormalMap that maps an item to Kernel::Vector_2

detaileddescription.para: This function creates an empty property map that maps iterators on the input range Item to std::size_t
This function provides the last primitive that has been fitted with the region.

simplesect.para: Primitive parameters that fits the region

para.computeroutput: successful fitted primitive via successful call of update(region) with a sufficient large region

detaileddescription.para: This function controls if a point with the item query is within the maximum_distance from the corresponding circle and if the angle between its normal and the circle radius is within the maximum_angle. If both conditions are satisfied, it returns true, otherwise false.
This function controls if the estimated radius is between minimum_radius and maximum_radius and if the region contains at least min_region_size points.

parameterdescription.para: indices of points included in the region

detaileddescription.para: This function fits the least squares circle to all points from the region.

parameterdescription.para: indices of points included in the region

simplesect.para: Boolean true if the circle fitting succeeded and false otherwise

briefdescription.para: shortcut to ease the definition of the class when using CGAL::Point_set_3.

detaileddescription.para: To be used together with make_least_squares_sphere_fit_sorting().

briefdescription.para: returns an instance of the sorting class to be used with CGAL::Point_set_3, with point and normal maps added to np.

briefdescription.para: Region type based on the quality of the least squares circle fit applied to 2D points.

detaileddescription.para: This class fits a circle to chunks of points in a 2D point set and controls the quality of this fit. If all quality conditions are satisfied, the chunk is accepted as a valid region, otherwise rejected.

parameterdescription.para: a descriptor representing a given point. Must be a model of Hashable.
a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is Item and value type is Kernel::Point_2
a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is Item and value type is Kernel::Vector_2
